name: net-agent
post_cmd: [[ $(svcs -Ho state net-agent) == 'online' ]] && /usr/sbin/svcadm restart net-agent || /usr/sbin/svcadm enable net-agent
post_cmd_linux: [[ $(systemctl is-active triton-net-agent) == 'active']] && systemctl reload-or-restart triton-net-agent || systemctl enable triton-net-agent; systemctl start triton-net-agent
